title: ImageSetStatistics
description: ImageSetStatistics computes statistics from a set of images. The whichstat option defines the type of statistic to compute, ranging from median to similarity-weighted metrics.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the images to be processed by ImageSetStatistics.

controls_list.title: Controls List
controls_list.description: Text file containing the list of control images.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The output image file where the computed statistics are stored.

which_stat.title: Which Stat
which_stat.description: Choice of statistic to compute: 0 for median, 1 for max probability appearance, 2 for weighted mean appearance, 3 for trimmed mean, 4 for max value, 5 for similarity-weighted (requires imagelist2), 6 for best local match label, 7 for max value from ROI.

roi.title: ROI Image
roi.description: Region of interest image file, optional depending on the whichstat option.

imagelist2.title: Image List 2
imagelist2.description: List of similarity images used for similarity-weighted statistics. Required if whichstat equals 5 or 6.
